thread.title: Robert Wilson Pickard
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Robert Wilson Pickard

author: Robert Wilson Pickard
title: Robert Wilson Pickard
text: Received blinds only to find they sent wrong size phoned customer service to be told it was my fault I'm very disappointed with blinds to go Ive got 2 blinds which are no use to me and 75 pounds worse off I would not recommend anyone to use this company.
